_comment: Editorial overrides for alternative descriptions in SEO internal linking. Maps whop slug to custom description for alternatives sections.

_examples.example-slug: Browse premium trading tools and educational resources similar to this offering
_examples.another-example: Discover other cryptocurrency trading courses and mentorship programs

_instructions: Add slug-based overrides here to customize alternative section descriptions
Use reasoned, editorial language that explains WHY alternatives are relevant
Focus on topical relevance, not just generic 'similar products'
Keep descriptions under 120 characters for better UX
